author: cms-sw
body:
ROOT 6.20 validation looks good. This PR proposes to start using existing ROOT 6.20 from IB/CMSSW_11_1_X/rootnext branch for 11.1.X IBs. Once we have successfully integration then I propose to move to ROOT 6.20.06 tag ( https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/5927 ) before building 11.1.0 release.

FYI, @silviodonato , @makortel
title: [11.1.X] Update root version to 6.20
